get.description:
Paging can be done by using the skip and take parameters.
Period filtering can be done with the fromDate and toDate parameters.
The dateTo value is exclusive except when on same day as dateFrom.
Meta data includes info on all redemptions, not just the filtered transactions.

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: The inclusive transaction date to search from

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: The exlusive transaction date to search to same day as fromDate is included

JsonApiDocument[AuthenticationResponse].description: A document wrapper for API responses

JsonApiErrorDocument[JsonApiError].description: A document wrapper for API error responses

JsonApiError.description:
The base error response message class.

It formats the {System.Net.HttpStatusCode} passed in the  to a high level error {Meniga.Runtime.WebApi.Models.Common.JsonApiError.Message}
as defined by the HTTP spec: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-10
E.g. for HTTP status code "400" the {Meniga.Runtime.WebApi.Models.Common.JsonApiError.Message} will be "Bad Request"
and for status code "500" {Meniga.Runtime.WebApi.Models.Common.JsonApiError.Message} will be "Internal Server Error"

message.description:
The title of the returned HTTP status code according the the HTTP spec,
e.g. for HTTP status code "400" the message will be "Bad Request"

messageDetails.description:
A detailed description of the error intended for the developer to understand exactly what failed.
This info is stripped from the response if error details are not configured to be emitted from the api.

PostAuthenticationTasksRequest.description: Request object with information about the Post Authentication Task.

RefreshTokenRequest.description: Request object with information about the refresh token

refreshToken.description: The refresh token of the person

clientId.description: The Id of the client that the refresh token was issued for

clientSecret.description: The client secret of the client the refresh token was issued for

subject.description: The subject the refresh token was issued for

states.description: Offer states to filter by. Expected values "all, activated, available, declined, expired".

offerIds.description: Offer ids to filter by. The {States} and {ExpiredWithRedemptionsOnly} parameters will be ignored when this parameter is set.

expiredWithRedemptionsOnly.description: Expired offers without any redemption transactions will be excluded when this parameter is set to true.

radiusKm.description: Radius in km for location filtering.

limitLocations.description: The maximum number of locations to be returned (per offer).

JsonApiDocument[Offer[],OffersSummary].description: A document wrapper for API responses

brandId.description: Brand id for the offer. If the offer is for a specific merchant then this property will be zero.

brandName.description: Brand name for the offer. If the offer is for a specific merchant then this property will be empty.

validationToken.description: Offer validation token that can be used to fetch and activate offers without being logged in (email etc)

reward.description: Offer reward. If the RewardType is Percentage then this will return the percentage, otherwise it returns the fixed reward amount.

minimumPurchaseAmount.description: Minimum purchase amount. Rewards are only given when purchases exceed this amount.

maximumRedemptionPerOffer.description: Maximum redemption amount of the offer

minimumAccumulatedAmount.description: Minimum accumulated amount to trigger a redemption

maximumPurchase.description: Maximum number of purchases that can be redeemed

lastReimbursementAmount.description: The amount of the last reimbursement made to the user

lastReimbursementDate.description: The date of the last reimbursement made to the user

scheduledReimbursementAmount.description: The amount of the next reimbursement

scheduledReimbursementDate.description: The date of the next reimbursement

daysLeft.description: Number of days left on the offer

activatedDate.description: The date when the offer was activated

declineDate.description: The date when the offer was declined

merchantId.description: Merchant id for the offer. If the offer is for a whole brand then this property will be zero.

merchantName.description: Merchant name for the offer. If the offer is for a specific merchant then this property will be empty.

merchantDeclined.description: If the offer has been declined this property will indicate whether the merchant was also delcined

activateOfferOnFirstPurchase.description: Indicates whether the offer will be activated automatically on first purchase or not

relevanceHook.description: A relevance hook for the offer

totalSpendingAtSimilarBrands.description: Total spending at similar brands during the offer valid period

totalSpendingOnOffer.description: Total spending at the offer brand/merchant during the offer valid period

webUri.description: Web uri to display on the offer

webUriLabel.description: Label to show instead of raw uri

seen.description: Indicates if the user has seen this offer

firstSeen.description: The moment the user first saw this offer

lastSeen.description: The moment the user last saw this offer

availableOffersActivated.description: Number of available offers that the user has activated

availableOffersDeclined.description: Number of available offers that the user has declined

offersActivated.description: Number of offers that the user has activated

offersDeclined.description: Number of offers that the user has declined

offersNotSeen.description: Number of offers that the user hasn't seen yet

offersEnabled.description: Indicates whether the user has enabled the offers feature

offersEnabledTimestamp.description: The timestamp of the last toggle (enable/disable) of the offers feature

termsAndConditionsAccepted.description: Indicates whether the user has accepted the offers terms and conditions

isReimbursementAccountValid.description: Indicates whether the user has a valid reimbursement account

totalCount.description: The total count of objects available from the endpoint based on the passed in filter

relevanceHookDetails.description: A URL for more details for a relevance hook

webpage.description: The URL for the merchant's web page.

distanceKm.description: Distance to merchant in km or null if unknown.

JsonApiErrorDocument[JsonApiClientError].description: A document wrapper for API error responses

JsonApiClientError.description: A bad request error object to be used with any 4xx HTTP error status code

message.description:
The title of the returned HTTP status code according the the HTTP spec,
e.g. for HTTP status code "400" the message will be "Bad Request"

messageDetails.description:
A detailed description of the error intended for the developer to understand exactly what failed.
This info is stripped from the response if error details are not configured to be emitted from the api.

modelState.description: A dictionary of property names (keys) and error messages (values) when creating or updating a resource.

JsonApiDocument[RedemptionTransaction[],.description: A document wrapper for API responses

activatedOffers.description: Number of offers the user has activated

spentAmount.description: The total amount spent in offers

redeemedAmount.description: Total amount redeemed for all offers

nextReimbursementAmount.description: The amount reimbursed to the user on the next reimbursement date

scheduledReimbursements.description: Redemptions that have not yet been reimbursed

totalCount.description: The total count of objects available from the endpoint based on the passed in filter

isVerified.description: Indicates whether the reimbursement account has been verified or not

accountInfo.description: Account information in the format determined by the account type

accountInfo.description: Account information in the format determined by the account type
